metadata.Title: CVE-2018-9138 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in cplus-dem.c in GNU libiberty, as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29 and 2.30. Stack Exhaustion occurs in the C++ demangling functions provided by libiberty, and there are recursive stack frames: demangle_nested_args, demangle_args, do_arg, and do_type.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-9138` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabihf - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-common - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-for-build - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-for-host - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-hppa-linux-gnu - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-hppa64-linux-gnu - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-i686-gnu - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-i686-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-i686-linux-gnu - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-ia64-linux-gnu - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-m68k-linux-gnu - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-multiarch - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-powerpc-linux-gnu - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-powerpc64-linux-gnu - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-powerpc64le-linux-gnu - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-riscv64-linux-gnu - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-s390x-linux-gnu - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-sh4-linux-gnu - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-source - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-sparc64-linux-gnu - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-x86-64-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-x86-64-linux-gnu - 2.32-7ubuntu4
binutils-x86-64-linux-gnux32 - 2.32-7ubuntu4
libbinutils - 2.32-7ubuntu4
libctf-nobfd0 - 2.32-7ubuntu4
libctf0 - 2.32-7ubuntu4
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> same libiberty commit as CVE-2018-12641

criterions.comment: binutils package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.32-7ubuntu4').
